titleStmt.title: Bon-acords decorement. Or, Newes from the North. Wherein is truely expressed the forme (or situation) of the famous citie of new Aberdeene, the vertues of the honourable and renowned governours thereof, together with these Grampians anagrames. : Wherewith is adjoyned the proofe, and praise of chast beautie, and the scorne of idols. / By William Mercer..
titleStmt.author: Mercer, William, 1605?-1676?

titleStmt.title: Bon-acords decorement. Or, Newes from the North. Wherein is truely expressed the forme (or situation) of the famous citie of new Aberdeene, the vertues of the honourable and renowned governours thereof, together with these Grampians anagrames. : Wherewith is adjoyned the proofe, and praise of chast beautie, and the scorne of idols. / By William Mercer..
titleStmt.author: Mercer, William, 1605?-1676?

notesStmt.note: Place and publisher from STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: pages cropped and mutilated through-out, with considerable loss of text. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
